audio_file: Relay the message John Melvin Dela Frez Zandro Bernardino 641060932531 010225.wav

transcription.text: Sandro Bernardino Hello, good morning Mr. Sandro Bernardino Ano po ito? Ano po? Nandiyan po ba si Sandro Bernardino, ma'am? Ano po si Sandro Bernardino?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: So, sa ibang kaposto na may pangatakot, ano naman po ang number na na?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Wala na siya ibang number, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Mga na-oras po ba namin siya, ma'am? Pwedeng makontak yung makakasal siya ng tawag sa amin.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Kung ito po, nakakontak niyo, mga sisipa po ako nasa bahay.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Nasi-sign pa kayo. Pwede naman sila
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Sige, ma'am. Pa-inform na lang po siya, ma'am.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ulit, ma'am. Galing po sa kanyang Maya Bank. Thank you po, ma'am, and have a nice day, po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Sandro Bernardino Hello, good morning Mr. Sandro Bernardino Ano po ito? Ano po? Nandiyan po ba si Sandro Bernardino, ma'am? Ano po si Sandro Bernardino?
translation.english: Sandro Bernardino. Hello, good morning Mr. Sandro Bernardino. What is this? What? Is Sandro Bernardino there, ma'am? Who is Sandro Bernardino?

translation.tagalog: So, sa ibang kaposto na may pangatakot, ano naman po ang number na na?
translation.english: So in another place where there is a threat, what is the number there?

translation.tagalog: Wala na siya ibang number, ma'am.
translation.english: He has no other number, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Mga na-oras po ba namin siya, ma'am? Pwedeng makontak yung makakasal siya ng tawag sa amin.
translation.english: Can we call him at a specific time, ma'am? So he can answer our call.

translation.tagalog: Kung ito po, nakakontak niyo, mga sisipa po ako nasa bahay.
translation.english: If you were able to contact him, maybe Iâ€™ll just tell him here at home.

translation.tagalog: Nasi-sign pa kayo. Pwede naman sila
translation.english: You're still signed in. It's okay for them.

translation.tagalog: Sige, ma'am. Pa-inform na lang po siya, ma'am.
translation.english: Alright, ma'am. Please just inform him, ma'am.

translation.tagalog: Ulit, ma'am. Galing po sa kanyang Maya Bank. Thank you po, ma'am, and have a nice day, po.
translation.english: Again, ma'am. This is from his Maya Bank. Thank you, ma'am, and have a nice day.
